front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Use of Blockchain in Supply Chain Finance

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines a baseline architectural framework and defines functional roles for blockchain-driven supply chain finance (SCF) implementations, e.g., core enterprise, suppliers, buyers, banks, blockchain platform providers, and so on. The procedures of registration, asset issuance, asset transference, financing based on asset on chain, asset clearing and settlement, and asset tracing, are explained. Finally, the technique requirement of the business system, and blockchain platform are discussed.
